title: Mary Rossick Kern and Jerome Kern Endowed Chair in Thyroid Tumor Research
description: To provide support for the Kern Endowed Chair holder including, but not limited to, salary, research, or program support with approval from the Head of the Division of Endocrinology.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Kern Endowed Chair holder including, but not limited to, salary, research, or program support with approval from the Head of the Division of Endocrinology.
